title: James.Bond.007.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
James.Bond.007.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Release Info:

James Bond 007-Nightfire


Year: 2002
Genre: Action (FPS)
Developer: Gearbox Software
Publisher: EA Games
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: enclosing


System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Pentium III 1GHz
Memory: 256 MB
Video: 64 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 2 GB


Game information:

Spy shooter, created based on the popular movie agent James Bond,
who once again have to overcome plenty of obstacles to save the world,
to reveal a monstrous conspiracy organization for the protection of nature,
seeking to arrange a nuclear apocalypse in the world, catch his leader.
He will travel to the Austrian mountains and a secret base on the ocean
floor to outer space. In total, the game has 20 missions for both single
and multiplayer games. Will not do well without all sorts of tricks Bond
super spy ammunition with objects (night vision goggles, shooting a fountain
pen, a laptop computer hacking various information systems), many types of
weapons, beautiful cars and naturally beautiful women ...

James Bond 007-Quantum of Solace



Year: 2008
Genre: Action (Shooter) / Arcade / 3D / 1st Person / 3rd Person
Developer: Treyarch, Nerve Software and Beenox Studios
Publisher: Activision
Published in Russia: New Disk
Publication Type: RiP
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: RELOADED



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Pentium (R) 4 2.4GHz or Athlon XP (TM) 64 2800 + MHz or any 1.8Ghz Dual Core
Memory: 512 MB
Video: 128 MB DirectX 9 compatible (GeForce 6600 or Radeon 9800)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 13 GB

Game information:

Any spy had not yet managed to surpass in skill and charisma
of legendary James Bond. The agent of Her Majesty addresses
the most difficult tasks. In perfectly ironed tuxedo and with
a radiant smile, he uncovers a global conspiracy, and suppresses
the diabolical plans and embarks on a most improbable scam.
Desperate shootings, the rapid pursuit, covert sabotage of
breathtaking - with the help of Quantum of Solace you personally
to uncover all aspects of life spy!

Now you have a unique chance to become James Bond XXI century.
Appearance and physique hero exactly recreated in the image of
Daniel Craig. You will find yourself in the middle of two films.
Familiar scenes and new points of "Casino Royale" and
"Quantum of Solace" is transmitted branded atmosphere and style
of stories about the agent "007". With incredibly realistic
graphics and sound immerse yourself in the exciting world of
deceit, intrigue, betrayal, madly expensive cars and seductive
girlfriends. It's time to try on a tuxedo!

Game Features:

New Bond. First in the games of the agent "007" appears a new
image of James Bond, Daniel Craig effectively detected. You'll
see a hero like that, remember how it "Casino Royale" and
"Quantum of Solace."

The right choice. Each new job is not like previous one.
You never know for sure how to do this time. Use different
tactics depending on events and situations. Quietly remove
the victim in a dark corner, to engage in a fierce fight,
or to arrange a shoot in the middle of the hotel lounge - it's up to you.

Looking from the outside. The most notorious scoundrel resist
James Bond. Increase your chances of winning by using just two
types - from the first and third person.
Like in the movies! Thanks to modern special effects,
immersion in the charming and ruthless world of James
Bond will be complete. Spectacular views, spectacular
explosions, stunts and graceful technique "picture-in-picture" -
this is not a complete list of graphic techniques.
Around the world. You will visit Bolivia, Montenegro,
Venice and Austria. Each area has its indescribable flavor.

James Bond 007-Blood Stone

Year: 2010
Genre: Action (Shooter) / Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Bizarre Creations
Publisher: Activision
Publication Type: RiP
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: RELOADED


System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Core 2 Duo E4300 1,8 GHz / Athlon 64 X2 4000 +
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: Nvidia Geforce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4800, DirectX 9 compatible
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 10 GB

Game information:

The storyline of the game James Bond 007: Blood Stone created
Fershtaynom Bruce (Bruce Feirstein) - author of the script
kinoblokbasterov famous "Golden Eye", "Tomorrow Never Dies",
"The World Is Not Enough". Exterior of the main characters of
the game repeats the images of characters in the movie,
starring Daniel Craig which were made ??and Judi Dench, and
the image of the new Bond girl can be easily find out the
singer Joss Stone. Also, these stars took part in the sound
of the original version of the game. Actor Motion Capture,
fulfilled the role of superspy, was understudy Daniel Craig -
Ben Cooke. In addition to the exciting story campaign,
the game represented a multiplayer mode for up to sixteen
participants. With extensive tools anyone can create an
agent for my taste - and looks set to pick up equipment.

Game Features:

Like in the movies. Project developers strongly adheres
to style the latest James Bond film. Players have to shoot
to kill out of hiding, to fight hand to hand and participate
in a dizzying chase on luxury cars.

Revived legend. The game's storyline was created by Bruce
Fershtaynom (Bruce Feirstein) - author of the script
kinoblokbasterov famous "Golden Eye", "Tomorrow Never Dies",
"The World Is Not Enough". And he once again skillfully
showed the world of international espionage where everyone
can be a traitor.

All the familiar faces. Exterior of the main characters of
the game repeats the images of characters in the movie,
starring Daniel Craig which were made and Judi Dench
(Dame Judith Olivia Dench), and the image of the new
Bond girl can be easily find out the singer Joss Stone
(Joss Stone). Also, these actors took part in the sound
of the game. In addition, the actor Motion Capture,
fulfilled the role of superspy, was understudy Daniel
Craig - Ben Cooke (Ben Cooke).

James Bond 007 - Legends




Year: 2012
Genre: Action (Shooter) / FPS
Developer: Eurocom
Publisher: Activision
Published in Russia: New Disk
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: ALI213



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: AMD / INTEL 2.0 GHZ
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB (ATI Radeon X1600 / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / INTEL HD 2000)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 12 GB

Game information:

New game blockbuster 007 Legends, prepared for the fiftieth anniversary
of the world-famous franchise, will allow players to remember the key
points and to perform the most exciting task of the popular James Bond
films. The first and only game of this magnitude, 007 Legends has an
original story based on the events of six classic films about the
adventures of a secret agent, including a new, twenty-third of the
film "007: Coordinates" Skayfoll. " Players awaits action worthy of
the Bond, as well as a unique spy gear, an impressive arsenal of
weapons and clever selection of cars. Armed to the teeth and prepared
for the deadly tasks, players will face the iconic villains in the
struggle that all means are good.You are waiting for the fighting
skills and techniques, dizzying special effects ... and of course,
beautiful women who have become the hallmark 007.

Game Features:

Hack safes and computers to gain access to classified information
and documents.
Experience the exciting chase and a fierce firefight in the style
of a unique 007.
Use the iconic cars, gadgets and secret weapon for successful assignments.
Take part in missions to protect, destruction and espionage in the
single and cooperative play.
Prove your friends and acquaintances that you are the best agent
in the multiplayer campaign in the game on a single screen.




Repack Features:  

James Bond 007-Nightfire

Version of the game - v1.1
Do not cut / recoded
Russian localization of 8 bit
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
